resources.string: You haven\'t subscribed to notifications about new anime series yet. Click on the \"Main\" menu and select something (≧◡≦) ♡

The image of the character in the form of a cute anime girl. She is wearing a white shirt and black glasses in a simple style. She has blue hair, light white skin, long cat ears and sky-blue eyes. She opened her mouth slightly, as if trying to explain something. Cute upper fangs stick out of her mouth. Cuteee!
